column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I was inspired to write this review after seeing its current rating...3.5 stars?!  What are you people thinking?!  This is my absolute FAVORITE tapas restaurant.  I recently moved to SF (by the way
column2: don't believe anything you hear about the "amazing" cuisine....with the exception of Chinese food and seafood
column5: and babareeba is on my list of "Things I Crave in Chicago".
